div.p:
Curia Capitali Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio
eiusdem vicesimo die mensis aprilis Anno Domini millesimo quingentesimo
vndecimo Quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent et cetera

Andreas Watsone
Dauisone
Alexander leitht
Duncanus andirson'
Willelmus
thomas laysk
Richardus Watsone
Thomas Watsone in gowlis
Thomas Wodman
Andreas
Georgius
Dauid
Johannes Watsone in grantuly
Johannes herroun'
Willelmus bynne
robertus fraser

head.add: the Auditouris of the prouostis gilberti menyeis and the denys of the gilde this five yeris bigane

div.p:
The said day Johne leslie of Warderis ser Johnne ruthirfurd
Johnne of cullane' James colisone Dauid steuart
thomas patry Red' robert
crag malcom crag

Eodem die compertum fuit per legittimam Inquisicionj Curie quod Walterus murray est legittimis
et propinquior heres quondam Dauid murray patris suj et cetera

Johannes Ruthirfurd miles Johannes cullane Andreas Cullane
Alexander gray patricius lesly thomas Waus thomas Wod alexander
menyeis patricius chernsid' Willelmus Wormet malcomus crag Dauid
mar georgeus Bisset et robertus Waus Jurati dicunt quod

Eodem die compertum fuit per legittimum Inquisicionem curie precedenti
quod Walterus honysone' est legittimus et propinquior heres quondam
Alexandrj honysone patris suj Et Issabelle cullan nostris suj de
de terrarum et annuis redditibus infra dictum burgum
et annuus redditibus Johannes honysone'
obijt et vestitus et sasitus

head.add: processus domini Andree couper de terra Willelmi moir'

div.p:
Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Andreas couper capellanus
perpetuus altaris sanctj Duthacj confessoris infra ecclesiam parrochialem sancti
nicholay de abirdene et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu
ix soldorum de terra vasta quondam Willelmi moir Jacente in vico Nauium
inter terram quondam andree Alanj ex occidentali et terra quondam
Willelmi scherar ex parte orientali et communiones vias regias versus boream
et austrum Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile pro
dicto annuo redditu preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentauit
in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus Testibus Donaldo
baxter Johanne glass' burgensis dictj burgj et gilberto prestone sergeando

head.add: processus domini andree coupar de terra quondam Johannes gonys

div.p:
Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus andreas coupar
capellanus perpetuus altaris sancti Duthacj infra ecclesiam sanctj nicholaij
dictj burgj et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu sextem
solidorum et vndecim denariorum monete scocie annuatim exeuntem et leuandum
de quadam terra vasta quondam Johannis gonys Jacente infra dictum
burgum in vico Nauium inter terras quondam Willelmi scherar ex
orientalj et occidentali partibus et communiones vias regias versus
boream et austrum Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
pro dicto annuo redditu preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in
sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam 2o die huius processus testibus
vt supra

head.add: processus domini andree couper de terra andreee malcomsone'

div.p:
Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus andreas
couper capellanus perpetuus altaris sancti Duthacj ecclesie parrochialis dictj burgj et
protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu quinque solidorum
sibi et dicto altarj annuatim debito et a longo tempore non soluto
de quadam terra vasta quondam Andree malcomsone Jacente
infra dictum burgum in vico superiori ecclesie ex australi parte eiusdem
vicj inter terram quondam thome prat ex orientali ex vna et communiones
vias regias versus occidens et boream et terram quondam thome
club versus austrum Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
pro dicto annuo redditu preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo
presentauit in curia tanquam 2o die huius processus Testibus vt supra

The said day comperit Dauid mar
process' led of the land of vmqhile Androw malcomsone be sere Androu
chaplane of sanct alter and the freris predicatouris pertening
to hyme in heretag' suld' turne him to na preiudice in his

head.add: processus domini Johannis prat de terra quondam Willelmi nory

div.p:
Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Johannes
prat capellanus perpetuus altaris sancte crucis infra ecclesiam
parrochialem beati nicholaij dictj burgj et protestatus fuit in forma Juris
pro vno annuo redditu vsualis monete scocie sibi et
dicto altarj annuatim debito de quadam terra vasta quondam Willelmi
Nory Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico superiori ecclesie ex australi
parte eiusdem inter terram Donaldj strathachin ex occidentali australi ex vna
et torrentem ad molendinum superius discendens versus oriens et
communionem viam regiam versus boream Ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis
in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus testibus
Johanne Richerdsone Johanne glass' and gilberto preston' sergeando

head.add: processus capellanorum de abirdene de terra Dauid chamer

div.p:
Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Dauid Waus collector
ac procurator capellanorum collegij ecclesie parrochiali de abirdene et protestatus
fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu xiij solidorum et octo
denariorum vsualis monete scocie dictis capellanis annuatim debito
et a longo tempore non soluto de quadam terra vasta quondam
Willelmi cantuly Jacente in vico Nauium ex occidentali parte eiusdem
inter terram quondam thome prat ex australi ex vna et terram quondam
Alexandrj chamer ex boreali partibus ab altera communionem viam regiam
versus oriens et montem sancte Katherine virginis versus occidens
Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et
lapides quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam secundo die
huius processus testibus testibus Johanne richerdsone Johanne glass'
et gilberto prestoun' sergeando

head.add: processus fratrum predicatorum de aberdene de terra Willelmi yong

div.p:
Eodem die accedens ad barram Regiosus vir frater Johannes gresone
procurator prioris et conuentus fratrum predicatorum dictj burgj et protestatus
fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu octo solidorum et quatuor
denariorum vsualis monete scocie dicto loco annuatim debito et a longo tempore
non soluto de quadam terra vasta quondam Willelmi young' Jacente in
vico furcarum ex orientali parte eiusdem inter terram quondam quondam
Robertj cullane ex boreali ex vna et terram magistri Alexandrj cullan
rectoris de ovin ex australi partibus ab altera et communiones vias regias
versus oriens et occidens Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit
in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus Testibus Donaldo
baxter et Johanne glas' ac gilberto prestone sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Regiosus vir frater Johanne Arnot
minister domus sancte trinitatis de Aberdene et protestatus fuit in forma
Juris pro vno annuo redditu sex solidorum et octo denariorum vsualis monete
scocie sibi et dicto loco annuatim debito et a longo tempore non soluto de quadam
terra vasta quondam Johannis hill Jacente in vico viridi dictj burgj inter
terram Johannis Ra ex orientali ex vna et communionem viam regiam qua
Itur ad locum fratrum carmelitarum dictj burgj ex occidentali partibus ab
altera terram sine ortum dictorum fratrum versus austrum et communionem viam Regiam
versus boream Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter
terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam
secundo die huius processus Testibus Andrea grig Johanne quhit
cors' burgense Et Andrea naughtie sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Dauid procurator
venerabilis virj magistri Dauid menyeis capellanj perpetuj altaris beatj michaelis
archangeli infra ecclesiam perrochialem beatj nicholaij de aberdene' situati Et
protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu
vsualis monete scocie sibi magistro Dauid annuatim debito de quadam terra vasta
quondam Willelmi nory Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico superiori ecclesie
ex australi parte eiusdem inter terram Donaldj strathachin ex occidentali
ex vna et terram sine aqueductum ad molendinum superius discendens ex
orientali partibus ab altera et communionem viam regiam versus boream Ad quam
terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos
balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam primo die huius processus
Testibus Donaldo baxter Johanne glass' et gilberto preston' sergeando

The said day the Prouost and bailyeis commandit Johnne arthour Androue
stratoun' Johanne andersone to tak with thame ane sclatar ane' masone and ane
wrycht And appris' Niniane blinselis landis quhilk Elizibeth lesly has coniunctfeftment
of as thai that was suorne tharto to morne at the nixt And atour commandit the
officiaris to warne the said Niniane and cuthbert Johnson' spous to the said
Elizibeth to se the said apprising quhat thai war warrit sen' the entires'
of the said Elizibeth to his coniunctfeftment tharto

The said day Androw fif and Waltir cullane bailyeis perofferit the breive of inquest
producit in Jugment be robert chapman till Wilyeame blak spous till Elizibeth hay
or ony vthiris personis that wald' schaw ane sufficient pouer of the said Elizibeth
of entires' tharto

The said day ser Johnne malisone protestit somlemptlie that the process' led be
the freris predicatouris of the said burgh' apoun' ane land pertening to him in heritag
liand' in the gallougat betuix the land of vmquhile Robert cullan' one the
northt and the land' of mastir alexander cullan parsone of oyne one the southt
suld' turne him nor his heritag to na preiudice becaus he had recouirit the
said land obefor be lauchful process' and had possessioun' of the samyne

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vltimo die
mensis aprilis Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo vndecimo

head.add: Statut' for the clengeing of the tovnw

div.p:
The said day it was statut and ordanit be the prouest bailyeis and
counsall for the tyme for the clengeing of the towne agane the quenys
cuming that the belman pas' throu all the hail towne and command and
charge all maner of persones that has ony myddingis apone the forgait
befor thar yettis and durris to devoid' red and cleng the samyn betuix this
and sonday vndir the pane of xl s' vnforgevin of the faltaris and thame
that reddis nocht the samyn And atour commandit the four officiaris to
tak with ilkane of thame tua witnes and pas' throu thar quarteris
of the towne and ger devoid' and red the hey gait of all swyne cruffis
being apon the forgat betuix this and sonday vndir the pane' of escheting
of the swyne of tham that haldis the said cruffis atour the said tyme
and ane amerciament of viij s' vnforgevin

div.head: gild' court
div.p:
Curia gilde Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
secundo die mensis Maij Anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo vndecimo

The said day the prouost bailyeis and Counsaile present for the tyme grantit
and gef to Johnne of murray and Johnne of buchane the quarter clerkschip
of the gastraw warand' be the dimissioun' of master thomas chamer that
had the samyne obefor equaly betuix thame for thar gud and continuall
seruice to be done in the queir and kirk of the said burgh'

The said day the bailyeis assignit this day viij dais to Waltir honyson
till ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be Dauid mar' eldar in the name'
and beahlf of Elizibeth chamer his spous for the wranguis' withhaldin fra
hir of ane schryne and ane padok hingand loke

The said day the bailyeis assignit this day xv dais to Walter honysone
till ansuer till the borgh' fundin one hyme be thomas chamer for the wrang
uis' withhalding fra him of ane premar buk pertening to him in arschip be the
deceis' of vmquhile alexander chamere his grantser clappit with siluer
with the almys apon' the said clasp of his said grantser' quhilk was
in his possessioun in the tyme of his deces'

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem quinto
die mensis maij Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo vndecimo

The said day The prouest Bailyeis counsaill and communite of the said burgh
warnit be the handbell and the officiaris oppinly throu the haill towne
gatherit and circualy Inquerit be Normond of lesly and gilbert prestoun'
officiaris all in ane voce concordand grantit and frely consentit
to Ressaue oure Souerane lady the queyne als honorablie as ony burgh
of scotland except' edinburgh' allanerlie and to mak as larg expens'
tharapone as the prouost and counsail diuis' for the honour of the towne
and plesour of his gud grace And for the money to furnis' and mak the
expens' herapone the haill towne representand the body of the samyne
grantit consentit and ordait certane commissaris that is to say the prouost
ser Johnne ruthirfurd' Johnne colison' Johnne of mar James colisoun'
Johnne of cullan' and Androu cullane to set certane takis fischeingis
and landis of thar' commonte for the termes to be thoucht expedient
be the said commissaris for the sowme ijC li' vndir or abuf as
thai think expedient to prouid the said propin allanerly And ordanit
ane commissioun' to be maid to the said commisaris and selit with thar
common' Seill Alsua thai ordand' assedacionis to be maid and diuisit
be the said commissaris to the personis takaris of the said landis and wattiris
to be selit with thar commone Selis for the termes that said commissaris
happinis to set the samyn Apoun' the quhilkis the prouost askit Insturment
of me ser Johnne sterueling notar public befor ser thomas bynne
ser Dauy leis sere thomas Wricht and ser Dauy lyel And the
said commissioun' and assedacionis to be maid one the souerast wis' to burges
induellaris of the said burgh'

The said day the prouost bailyeis counsaill and communite commandit and ordanit
all pynouris haffand' hors within this burgh to entir to morne at the nixt and
cleng the towne of all myddingis and na labour to be done be thaim
quhil the tovne be clengit And ordanit the officiaris to warne the said
pynouris to entir tharto

The said the Dauid brois' present to the prouost and bailyeis ane breif
of lynyng betuix him and alexander malisone And the bailyeis assignit
this day viij dais for the serving of the said breif

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimo die mensis
Maij Anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo decimo

div.head: Statut for the schippis
div.p:
The said day It was statut and ordanit be the prouost bailyeis and Counsaill
that na schippis in tyme tocum cumand' within the havin sall ly betuix the ferry hous'
and the havin moutht bot in the gawpuyle betuix the fest of pasche and the Natiuite
of the our lady callit the lettir mary day langar thane ane tyd gif thai may
fleit vnder the pane of euiry schip that lyis atour the said tyd of xl s' vnforgevin
to the reperacioun' of the peir and the beknys

Item it was statut and ordanit that all personis duelland vteutht the forgait
in the bak stretis samony as salbe warnit and chargit tharto and billit be the prouost and
bailyeis furnys and graitht the staris of the forgait with arres' werk deulys as efferis
vndir the pane of ilk persone that beis requirit tharto and furniss' nocht the samyn' of s'
vnforgevin for the Ressaving of our Souerane lady the queyne

Alsua it was statut and ordanit that na swyne being within this burgh' yong
nor auld' be haldin vteutht band' and of the forgait for ane fiftene dais this
day being runnyne vnder the pane of slauchtir of the said swyne escheting
of thame and banyssing of thame that aw samyne And als that all the tovn'
be devoydid' of the swyn croffis vndir the samyn pane betuix this and thurisday
nixt tocum

Alsua it was statut and ordanit that all manere of persone or personis that bringis
ony gr byrkis holingis gyrs' herbis or ony vthir grene flouris haf common'
passag and sall haue fre money and reddy siluer for the samyn'

The said day Elizabet meldrum the Relict' of vmquhile Jonhne portar lauchfullie warnit
and callit be William scrimgeour officiar' and' nocht comperit till haue ansuerit at the Instance
of Willyeame' abirdour in amerciament of the court in defalt of presens
Curia Balliuorum burgi de Aberdene' tenta in pretorio Eiusdem xij die mensis maij anno quo supra

The said day Elizabetht meldrum the spous of Jonhne arthour lauchfullie warnit calit and'
nocht comperit for ansuer the tribulance of William abirdour quhilkis scho wes in amerciament
of the court et cetera

The said day androw meldrum with the quhitcott wes fundin feyt seruand' to Jonhne mar
tailyour quhill the fest of Witsunday for ij s' of fee

The saide day alexander menyes grantit him awande Dauid banerman' xv s' vj d' quhilkis the
bailyeis chargeit him to pay within terme of law
